txt.en:
'The Brown Lands are a desolate place, grim and inhospitable. Nothing can grow there for long.

'Gamal was sent there to scout for signs of Easterling encroachment. He is trying to save enough coin to purchase a horse of his own, and not just any horse! The steed on which his heart is set is named Leoma, and he believes the blood of the mearas flows in her veins. Maybe it does, I cannot say.

'But I think likely not.'
Tell me about the Brown Lands.
